title: 820-00165 NO WD. Sometimes green light on MG but mostly not.
message:
Hello friend,

ppbus_g3hot - 8.2V
PP3V42_G3H - 3.42V
PP5V_S5 - 0V
PM_SLP_SUS_L - 0V
3V3_SUS - 0V
PM_RSMRST_L - 0V
PM_PWRBTN_L - 0V
SMC_ONOFF_L - 3.4V
SMC_RESET_L - 3.1V

Please advice how to proceed. Thanks!

title: 820-00165 NO WD. Sometimes green light on MG but mostly not.
message:
"ppbus_g3hot - 8.2V"
This is a good reason...

Post exact voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
Be sure R7100 is good.
Check w/ and w/o LIO flex connected.
Without LIO flex cannot get Magsafe light, but see if you get then correct PPBUS_G3H.

title: 820-00165 NO WD. Sometimes green light on MG but mostly not.
message:
SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SCL - 3.42V / 585 diode mode
SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SDA - 3.42V / 585 diode mode
R7100 is good.
without LIO still 8.2V

title: 820-00165 NO WD. Sometimes green light on MG but mostly not.
message:
Look s like SM issue.
Try reballing it first.
If no result, try other SMC.

Check around SMC (2 OF 2) page 37.
Be sure all traces and pull-up resistors for SMC_Txx lines are good.
